svg.text: Understanding the two forces that determine life outcomes
‚Ä¢ Moved from low to mid through effort
‚Ä¢ But no strength to press on
‚Ä¢ Just trying to survive each day
Study, CV writing, design, lead, communicate
‚Ä¢ Hard Work - putting in the hours
"Stay in a great mood in the absence
of things to be in a great mood about"
If you want to be insanely great,
you can't do the bare minimum.
There is an effort required - insane effort.
‚Ä¢ If you can do both, the better you are
You gain confidence by doing, not thinking.
Read ‚Üí Absorb ‚Üí Express in your own words
Writing is an expression, don't hold back
Edit later, just pour it out first
‚Ä¢ People - Who are you learning from?
‚Ä¢ Pace - How fast are you growing?
1. Get your focus back - practice it
The Purpose Reset Framework ¬© Precious Kolawole
Developed from 6 years of professional and academic observation
Knowing yourself and what you want to become helps you put in the right amount of effort.
Knowledge shows you WHERE. Mindset gets you THERE. You need BOTH.
